title: List of Bleach episodes
summary: The episodes of Bleach anime series are based on Tite Kubo's manga series of the same name. The series is directed by Noriyuki Abe; produced by TV Tokyo, Dentsu and Pierrot; and was broadcast in Japan from October 5, 2004, to March 27, 2012.[1]  The series follows the adventures of a teenager named Ichigo Kurosaki, who can see spirits and becomes a Soul Reaper after assuming the duties of Soul Reaper Rukia Kuchiki.
